name: Rollup Economics Dashboard
about: This dashboard breaks down the on-chain revenues (txn fees), costs (posting data to L1) and raw materials (L1 calldata, usage metrics .etc) of rollups. It currently includes data on Optimism, Arbitrum, Aztec, Starknet, zksync, and Loopring.
question_1: The dashboard is a data-driven resource for learning about the health of rollup economies, including that of Optimism, and has 140+ stars on Dune.
question_2: I do freelance on-chain data analysis work for different projects.
